meta.name: The Imposter
meta.description: A splashy seaside hotel becomes the centre of a bitter family dispute as matriarch Helen refuses to sell, despite pressure from her three adult children. But Helen is hiding a secret: a daughter she gave up for adoption decades ago. When Amanda suddenly appears, Helen welcomes her with open armsâ€” but is Amanda who she says she is? The lucrative hotel is the ultimate prize and a twisted scheme soon spirals into betrayal and ultimately, murder.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: While a family is divided over the lucrative sale of some property, a daughter given up for adoption reappears.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Flashbacks reveal the truth of Amanda's identity. Simon tries to convince his siblings to draw up a legal agreement, preventing Amanda from a claim on the hotel.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Amanda reveals to Helen that Todd is plotting to obtain a court order to force her medical power of attorney. Lee makes a horrifying discovery.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Confrontations and revelations shake the family as Simon, Amanda and Helen drive out to remote bushland.
